pages.text: By default, the $(2)Pyramid Mode$() sets the Projector to generate a force field in a pyramid-like shape. The thickness of the pyramid-like shape depends on its size. Each $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() increases the size of the field by 1 block in all directions.

pages.title: Field Adjustment
pages.text: Placing a $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() into an item slot marked by a directional arrow has a different effect. A module placed in either the left, right, front or back item slots will scale the field by 1 block in both opposing directions at the same time. Placing a module in either the up or down item slots will scale the field by 1 block only in that direction.

For example, to increase the height of a force field by 1 block; add a $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() into an item slot marked by a directional arrow pointing towards the top-left or top-right of the GUI screen.
